messages.content: Previous Daily Discussion: #deleted-channel

Next Daily Discussion: #deleted-channel

__Votes__:
Silent 3 (boss): 1
Silent 2 (boss): 6
Press the Attack (Slime Boss card): 0
Instant Inferno (Hexaghost card): 1
Endure (Champ card): 6
HEY EVAB
COMPLAIN ABOUT THE POTION
bot HATES daylight savings time
good for it
also we already discussed silent 3 🤔

basically just a fire potion that gives you a bit more damage in exchange for taking time to use. so you lose that abitily to do a panic 20 to kill an enemy thats living by a thread. however when used preemptively, such as on an act one elite its better. Overall its a really good potion to see in act one, works in act two but you don't really want it past that point
oh and sentries artifact is a big problem for this potion
So a fire pot in an investment fund?
truth be told, I used it that way as well
~~if someone ever says they used it as an artifact stripper, I will <Giga Beam> them myself~~

embeds.title: Giga Beam
embeds.description:
Rare Attack / 3 :e_guardian: / The Guardian

Deal 36 (40) damage to ALL enemies.
**Strength:p_strength:** affects this card 2 (4) times.
Skip your next turn.

messages.content: it's fine in act 1 for elites specifically - i remember a couple of times walking into jaw worm+slime fight or something similar and having to use it to survive the fight but by the time it gets to the third turn i already have it down to like 15 hp and half the pot is wasted
same deal in act 2 tbh, barely even good there, and in act 3 it's almost completely useless
honestly i'd rather just have a fire pot
this potion also teaches new players about the value of NOW
i like the flavoring at least. the concept is cool. i just wish it'd go off faster
it's got THE BOMB problems 😔
because I feel like a complete newbie to StS would see this and be like "this is a fire pot but better"
i think even a newb would see the 3 turn delay and think they'd have to be careful
you know, if you're going to make a potion that waits as long as The Bomb does, you could at least make it AoE
btw counter potion is between this and fire pot in both respects, because you need to use the counter 1 turn early instead of 2
also it's literally named after a molotov cocktail
yes
counter pot delay is 1 turn to theoretically infinite turns
and sometimes 0 turns
if you're champ or snecko
i mean even if they're attacking every turn
like nob
you need to use it a turn early to actually save hp
otherwise you just get a kill while tanking the hit you wanted to prevent
the 0 turns was <Preemptive Strike>

embeds.title: Preemptive Strike
embeds.description:
Uncommon Attack / 1 (0) :e_champ: / The Champ

Deal damage equal to your **Counter:p_counter:** to ALL enemies.
Lose half of your **Counter:p_counter:.**

messages.content: the theoretically infinite turns is if you can somehow make an infinite stun combo

which is probably:
<Haunted Hand> + <Cheap Shot> + 2x <Nightmare Vision+>

embeds.title: Haunted Hand
embeds.description:
Uncommon Skill / 1 :e_hexa: / The Hexaghost

**Ethereal**. **Afterlife.**
Draw 2 (3) cards.
All cards in your hand become **Ethereal**.

embeds.title: Cheap Shot
embeds.description:
Rare Attack / 2 (1) :e_champ: / The Champ

Deal 5 damage.
If the enemy is a Boss, deal damage two more times. If not, **Stun** it.
**Exhaust**.

embeds.title: Nightmare Vision
embeds.description:
Uncommon Skill / 0 :e_hexa: / The Hexaghost

**Exhume** an (2) **Ethereal** card (cards).
**Exhaust**.

messages.content: Yeah, this and the Counter Potions kinda lack identity of their own, as these two are basically a fire pot but with a different damage type.

in the collection's potion lab this has the purple border which indicates that its supposed to be hexaghost exclusive, but its not..? i think it should be
gains a lot of value from stuff like <heat shield> <heat crush> and <living bomb>

embeds.title: Heat Shield
embeds.description:
Uncommon Skill / 1 (0) :e_hexa: / The Hexaghost

Gain **Block:p_block:** equal to Soulburn:p_soulburn: on ALL enemies, then remove Soulburn:p_soulburn:.

embeds.title: Heat Crush
embeds.description:
Uncommon Attack / 3 :e_hexa: / The Hexaghost

Deal 20 (30) damage.
Damage is increased by enemy's Soulburn:p_soulburn:.

embeds.title: Living Bomb
embeds.description:
Uncommon Skill / 0 :e_hexa: / The Hexaghost

Apply 4 (8) **Soulburn:p_soulburn:.** When it detonates, it affects ALL enemies.

messages.content: honestly just any soulburn, since the turn timers all group into 1
lets u start the timer early if u dont draw any soulburn turn 1
helps a lot on nemesis
yep
cause sear will force it to start if u dont lol
wont happen again 😳
this potion probably gets a lot better with red candle 🤔
It was, but then it was changed as **<Ecto-Cooler>** was even weirder one to be available to all.

embeds.title: Ecto-Cooler
embeds.description:
Common Potion / The Hexaghost

Choose 1 of 3 random **Ethereal** cards from any class to gain. It costs 0 this turn.

messages.content: speaking of which, hermit doesn't have a global potion I don't think
Well, he doesn't have to.
I despise this potion
Imagine fire potion that can't do the one thing it's good for (killing something immediately) and can be resisted by an artifact
In a game where enemies can easily kill you in two rounds
I guess it's closer to poison potion but even that has potential to instantly finish something off
omg possibly silent 2 for the next daily discussion...
anyway, molotov is kinda funky bcs i dont feel like i can use it well
